userUtterance.text: Can you translate this page into Spanish?

agentUtterance.text: I can translate only part of this page. It is better to use the translation dropdown in the header.

playbookInput.precedingConversationSummary: The user is viewing the Privacy page and wants to read the content in Spanish.

playbookOutput.executionSummary: The user has requested the page to be translated and was directed to instead use the translation function.
